data.description:
Asgard’s Wrath 2 is free with the purchase of Meta Quest 3.

“Masterpiece” —IGN
“2023 Quest Game of the Year.” —Road to VR
“Worthy of the Gods.” —Game Informer
“The best VR game ever made.” —Android Central
“An absolute must-play.” —TechRadar

Awaken, Cosmic Guardian – The fate of reality lies in your hands. Travel across vast realms inhabited by the gods in pursuit of the Trickster God Loki, who threatens to undo the threads of the universe. It’s up to you to battle gods and monsters alike as you take on one of the biggest and most epic scale Action RPGs ever experienced in VR. Alongside legendary Egyptian gods, you’ll fight deadly warriors and awe-inspiring mythical creatures through physics-based, visceral combat with unique weapons and playstyles. Possess unique mortal heroes and convert loyal animals into your own warrior followers as you explore a massive, free-roaming and living world and solve mind-bending god-scale puzzles. 

The sequel to one of the most critically-acclaimed VR games ever, Asgard’s Wrath 2 is the massive VR adventure you’ve been waiting for.

changelog.change_log:
This update focused on some long requested features - the ability to earn rewards from prior events by using Nova stones and support for multiple game saves.
We are still hard at work on the Quest 3 high resolution texture update. We hope to be able to share some example screenshots “soon.” This is taking longer than we had hoped, but it is making solid progress.
We have other exciting updates in the works that we will reveal soon. In the meantime please keep the feedback coming on our discord server linked in the store page, and thank you for playing!

Nova Stones can now be used to craft items at Bes and Ptah. This allows players to collect rewards from prior events:
- Bes - Cosmic Event Customizations 
- Ptah - Cosmic Event Armor and Weapons 

We have implemented the Save Menu which will allow players to store up to five save files. 

- Achievements - Updated the Librarian achievement icon from 250 to 100.
- Fixed an issue where the Librarian achievement would get stuck at 99%.
- Players may need to start a new save file and obtain a Codex entry to trigger the achievement. 
- Fixed issue in Newsfeed where the winning faction is always displayed as player faction in newsfeed after the Cosmic Event ends.
- Fixed an issue where the Grapple point fails to pull the player forward near the monster den 'Inferno's Leap' in the Drekahraun Lava Fields. 
- Fixed an issue which prevented the anomaly in Papyrus Swamp - Overgrown Reservoir -  'Vicarious Thrills (S5S03)' to properly spawn.
- Fixed an issue caused by quitting the game before meeting Horus in the Temple Atum which caused the player to start in Ra's Abandoned Outpost unable to progress.
- Fixed issue where a Cursed Spirit fails to activate when entering and exiting Pause Menu or another room within the level after the spirit is hit by Mereret’s orb
- Fixed issue where followers are repeatedly quick reset when following the player down the slide traversal in the 'Nubian Shipwreck'.
- Fixed an issue in Papyrus Swamp - Perplexing Passage - where the bridge connecting the entrance and end of the 'Perplexing Passage' Monster Den will reset after reloading the title - and the lever to activate it will be inaccessible.
- Fixed an issue in Drekahraun Lava Fields - Fortress of Flames - where the quest marker is misplaced for the first horn piece in 'The Southlands' during 'S5M03 - Battle Cry'.
- Fixed a text issue in Rift Dungeon - Cyrene - where an inconsistency is visible with Cyrene's 'Electric Discharge' ability on the Skill Tree menu and the 'Tidal Threat' Weaver Trial throughout 'Async Dungeons'.
- Fixed issue where a player can use a Wahka Totem to bypass a puzzle and retrieve the first gear in the Royal Observatory. 
- Fixed News Feed issue where the text for 'Pushback Surging Chaos Complete! Order Won!' fails to list the items that the winning team obtained in the News Feed.
- Fixed an issue in Papyrus Swamp - The Shallows - where enemies stop spawning when a specific enemy is eliminated and then the player perishes while in the Fishing Village Ruins causing the gate to remain closed stopping progression.
- Fixed several issues where Loki Anomaly rifts spawned in the ground. 
- Fixed an issue in The Shallows where enemies may spawn under map making the player unable to progress during The Cursed One quest due to inability to switch to God form.
- Fixed an issue in Drekahraun Lava Fields - Fortress of Flames - where progression in 'S5M03 - Battle Cry' can become blocked when entering the 'Fortress of Flames' before the final objective is completed.
- Fixed an issue where the Into the Multiverse Cosmic Event Sword Rewards relics fail to show on any sword rewarded from the 'Into the Multiverse' Cosmic Event throughout the title.
- Fixed an issue where the Codex entry for Surtur Shocker erroneously is present in the title.
- Fixed an issue where the Bruiser mini-boss out-heals the damage the player can do when affected by the "Enemy Heal" modifier in Uncharted Rift. 
- Fixed an issue where a Fishing Spider enemy is stuck inside a wall on the path left of 'Papyrus Swamp' travel stone.
- Fixed an issue where players may be unable to see the fish swimming around in the water in the 'Lower Swamp Oasis'.
- Fixed an issue where Cosmic Guardian's skin clips through the pants of 'Golden Cherub Plate' on the paper doll and the mirror in 'The Inbetween'.
- Fixed issue where the Curse Spirit fails to trigger a scream to unlock wall switch when hit by Curse Slingshot in 'Sheltered Stash Monster Den' near 'The Red Chasm Gates'.
- Fixed an issue in Async Dungeons where the Weaver Trials 'Squid Attack'  fails to progress as the user gets kills with the harp throughout Rift Dungeons.

Here are the release notes for the next AW2 patch, version 3.0.1481276.

We are still working on support for multiple save games and the high resolution texture pack for Quest 3.  I expect support for multiple saves to ship before the texture pack, as going through the entire game and ensuring that perf holds is proving to take a good chunk of time.

We continue to investigate issues reported by the community and are thankful for your ongoing support! Please keep the feedback coming.

- Added three new Loki anomalies.
- Fixed Cosmic Events progression and objective tracking issues.
- Duplicate/unused codex entries have been removed from Bestiary.
- Fixed an exploit that allowed players to bypass thin walls in some cases.
- Fixed respawn loop in some rare cases when riding mounts over hazards.
- Pressing pause while a Cosmic Event notification is showing now opens the Cosmic Event menu.
- Players can no longer grapple items they are holding.
- Additional progression fixes for Tannu's Belly.

- Fixed bug where player could get stuck in MR anomalies.
- Fixed issues with floating wildlife.
- Fixed a bug where enemies could spawn in without visible weak points when using the Bow.
- Fixed issues where the player gets stuck and unable to dismount Bruiser.
- Fixed Hidden Folk respawning behavior.
- Updated Pa’ahket’s mounted behavior to prevent swapping from Mortal to God form while mounted.
- Fixed Cosmic Events rewards showing potential rewards for completed quests.
- Fixed a bug where Bestial Blade could push enemies around as it moves.
- Fixed Cosmic Event objective locking/unlocking.
- Fixed incorrect collision observed blocking the entrance towards Monster Den 'Infested Temple Overflow' near 'Temple of Osiris’.
- Fixed issue where enemies could spawn in terrain in Uncharted Rift’s Nest levels. 
- Fixed several instances of incorrect collision observed in the Drekahraun Lava Fields.

- Fixed issue where God Puzzle's Statue is rotated towards the wall when reloading the level during the puzzle's vase phase in the 'Tomb of the Scribe'.
- Fixed issue where rarely, some objectives of "[S2M03] Elegy for the Fallen King" may fail to progress when completing the required steps.
- Fixed issue where Mereret will rarely spawn in invisible and become locked after being transformed to cross the Flooded Canal, blocking progression.
- Fixed issue where the player would become soft locked when fast traveling back to the 'Astrolabe Core' travel stone after recruiting Thoth in the Saga 3 Quest: 'The Way Forward'.
- Fixed issue where Travel Stone percentage does not reach 100% after discovering all Travel Stones in 'Tomb of the Scribe'.
- Fixed progression blocker when player is able to exit the elevator in Temple of Shu early onto a higher floor skipping a portion of the area during S2M11 'Son of the Ennead'.
- Fixed progression blocker by missing grab points when reloading after retrieving ‘Surtur's Bow’ in the Blistering Vents.
- Fixed progression blocker where the objective related to 'Collecting the Tools to Help Abraxas Scale the Waterfall' can be completed before freeing the 'Godly Chisel' breaking the logic.
- Fixed issue where some objectives of the Saga 2 quest, ‘Elegy for the Fallen King’, may fail to progress when completing the required steps.
- Fixed issue where Divine Artifacts fail to be collected if the player immediately lets go upon grabbing one throughout the title. 
- Fixed issue where player was able to fast travel to ‘Temple of Atum’ during the fast travel tutorial, which potentially broke progression. 
- Fixed progression blocker caused by reloading after retrieving ‘Sutur’s Bow’. 
- Fixed issue where players could forward dismount through The Shallows exit cave, breaking 'The Cursed One' Main Quest's logic and blocking progression.
- Fixed issue where it's impossible to access the Corpse Eater Feather Tip loot after defeating the Corpse Eater.
- Fixed issue where Monster Den percentage fails to reach 100% when all of them have been found and completed in the 'Papyrus Swamp’.

- Various minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

Hotfix for Patch 2 that includes the following fixes:
- Fixed Tanuu "Inside the Beast" quest progression
- Text update for Inbetween chest.
- Fixed dismounts not working on certain bridges
- Fixed Endless Dungeon save bug.
- Fix for occasional dismounts climbing up on nearby ledges
- Fixed progression blocker bug where players couldn't give the Ankh to Heru during the 'Peace Offering' side quest
- Fix missing dialogue in inbetween
- Fix vfx on mixed reality weapons
- Fixed incorrect controller instruction in codex entry for Alvilda's claws.
- Fixing whip slash damage through walls
- Fix orbital damage relic when socketed to protean sword
- fixed a bug causing a looping respawn in some hazards when mounted

We've been hard at work since our holiday patch on fixes and improvements. Check out the build details below!
Thank you for playing and reporting issues. We hope these changes level up your Wrath experience!  

FIXES AND IMPROVEMENTS

- Fixed progression breaking issues:
> Completing Tanuu before completing the Observatory
> Pirate Cove bridge switch not working under some conditions
> Collecting the Tefnut Sun Disk fragment sometimes didn’t count
> Sometimes you would get sent back to the beginning of the Duat on death

- Fixed progression bugs that only appeared when playing in a non-English language:
> Castor will not shake hands with the player.
> Horus will not accept the Balance Stone from the player
> Using Djehuty’s head

- Increased the audio sample rate on the Quest 3
- Added an ON/OFF settings toggle for using the consumable left stick click.
- Added an ON/OFF settings toggle for displaying the belt menu
- Remove the hero VO when quick consuming items
- Reduced difficulty of the Bruiser boss fight at the end of the Scorpion Lair
- Fixed the controller relative joystick mode setting not working properly.
- Improve animation for Bone Beads mode changes
- Auto collect protean sword's attached item when holstering the weapon
- Improved performance when firing harp projectiles
- Improved performance for overworlds throughout the game
- Improved performance on body part explosions from weapons
- Improved performance when performing the 'Heavenly Havoc' Heroic 
- Fixed issue where players would respawn far away from the spot where they died while inside the Juvenile Feeding Chamber in the Scorpion Lair
- Fixed a bug where certain dismounts would pass through gates
- Fixed bug in Sanctuary of Balance where a player could reach a lever early when using the God Grapple to reach a higher platform during the god puzzle
- Fixed rare Uncharted Rift crash that could occur during the 'Wind Serpopard' finisher sequence
- Fix for player getting stuck inside of Eythingamathur's model after clipping into it during its dying animation
- Fixed Giant Cobras failing to dig up during the first combat portion of the Monster Den 'Lost RIdge Camp' preventing full completion
- Fixed issue where player skin dye and player title resets when returning to the Inbetween from Uncharted Rift
- Fixed bug when 'Haptics Intensity' is set to 0 yet the player continues to experience haptic feedback during IGCs and specific user actions
- Fixed localization bug for followers reacting in English when tossed their favorite food
- Fixed bug where haptics are missing when the player hits enemies or destroys objects using various primordial weapons
- Fixed bug where the player can be damaged by Abraxas's Bladestorm skill if it is used after the axe is thrown back by an enemy
- Fixed global bug when using Prosperity relic on ranged weapons
- Fixed issues where the follower requirements are missing from certain monster dens
- Fixed bug in Temple of Osiris where players are unable to access an optional chest after completing The Osirion puzzle and obtaining Manu's Shield
- Fixed bug where the Charged Assault Cosmic Objective does not progress when using certain ranged weapons
- Fixed bug where the player  is unable to give the Ankh to Heru under rare conditions
- Fixed bug where players were able to pull the offerings out of their holdings in the Sanctuary of the Royal Family
- Fixed localization bug where Djehuty's voiceover strings are displayed unlocalized when choosing him for the Uncharted Rift
- Fixed issue where Final Score displayed with a question mark after finishing an Uncharted Rift in French
- Fixed scout grapple exploit
- Fixed a bug where the player could be pushed out of battle barriers
- Fixed various blockers in Loki Anomalies
- Fixed exploit allowing crossing of some lava hazards unintentionally
- Fixed bug where in the pause menu may become unresponsive if the player acquires a follower inspiration skill during combat
- Fixed a rare issue where the luminous lever is missing from the pedestal during the star-crossed lovers quest
- Fixed progression blocker in Temple of Tefnut
- Fixed rare issue of getting stuck during Cosmic Projector tutorial after reloading before tutorial completion
- Fixed progression skip in Valley of Bones
- Fixed progression blocker in Oasis of Sorrow
- Fixed issue when getting stuck as Baba during Monkey Business quest
- Fixed Tidal Torrent particle effects when resuming from pause menu
- Fixed codex unlocks for certain initial settings
- Fixed customization offset to avoid vision clipping.
- Fixed enemies using knockback attacks in MR anomalies
- Bug fixes for Into the Darkness quest in the Cisterns
- Ensure cosmetic armor, skin dyes, and titles are properly equipped for Cosmic Rifts
- Fixed arena endless mode max wave count
- Restore absent hallowed equipment if it was missing from inventory
- Fixed stun knockbacks having double knockbacks
- Fixed a bug where Kivuli Stones would reset when pausing the game
- Fixed follower teleport during grapple
- Fixed quill's release reset location in the Tomb of the Scribe
- Fixed cosmic quest event for charged projectiles
- Fixed exploit to teleport through walls using the command beam during dismount
- Fixed a bug where fast traveling out of a tent or house would lock Follower's command beam from use.
- Prevent accidental access to Tanuu while still hibernating in Papyrus Swamp.
- Fixed bug with Abraxas possession in the Great Sand Sea
- Fixed a bug where Cursed Canopic Jars could be broken with Bonestorm from any distance.
- Fixed Viggo mount's burn VFX when sinking in lava
- Fixed bugs during Alvilda's tutorial sequence
- Fixed some rare cases where the player could fall out of the world when mounting the scout
- Fixed a graphical issue when changing characters while in front of certain mirrors
- Fixed bug where players were allowed to grapple Followers during dialog
- Fixed prosperity relic on staff kill
- Fixed bounce and split arrow going through enemy shields
- Fixed player getting pushed out of bounds by 'Skrithan Elder' enemy in 'Blistering Vents'
- Fixed Djehuty's bone storm activation in silent cavern's trials
- Fixed issue with cosmetic items sometimes appearing to be missing in inventory

Asgard’s Wrath 2 - Patch 1

Quest 3 only - initial visual enhancements.
* Added a toggle in the User Interface section of the settings menu for 90hz
* Added a toggle in the User Interface section of the settings menu for Enhanced Rendering Features - this will increase resolution and the distance multiplier on LODs (Levels of detail)
Automatically change your tracked quest to better guide people from the Inbetween to the Scorpion Lair when it’s time to find medicated bait for Pa-Akhet.
Fixed messaging and functionality around the rewards chest in the Inbetween.
* To unlock the chest, you need to leave a Divine or Dread Soul on level 3 of an Uncharted Rift, then check back after 4PM, Pacific Time. (Either the same or next day.)
* You can stack multiple rewards for a max of 5.
* We will continue to iterate on this feature and are investigating the potential of adding a timer in game to make the countdown more clear.
There was a Loki Anomaly chest in Muspelheim that was empty.
Sending resources from Uncharted Rift dungeons back to the main story mode via DM Wells was breaking the counters for Sidequests/Requests.
Fishing bait got a significant buff.
Added a settings toggle to enable/disable reminder notifications. These are the ones that include a character portrait. This way the player can turn them off while still getting quest progress notifications.
Fixed a visibility issue when riding Mereret from the Sobek Bathhouse area back to the canal.
Fixed an issue around the calculation of map completion on the Great Sand Sea.
Removed a screeching sound on some grapples in the Red Chasm.
In the Blistering Vents, if you died after the Ragnarök area, you would always be sent back to this stone forcing unintended re-traversing.
Fixed a corrupt save problem if you quit during the AW1 recap.
Changed the save file order of operation to complete writing a new save and then overwrite the old one. We previously immediately started overwriting the old save which made it susceptible to corruption if something outside of the game interrupted the operation.
Automated Sanzaru Build - For internal testing only. Changelist 1444263
